concept.title: Colour Palette Component
concept.shortdesc: The Colour Palette component provides palette support to the GDI and Font and Bitmap Server. A palette is a set of colors, which is a subset of the full range of colors.

conbody.p: The Colour Palette was previously used to index the colors used on phones that displayed a limited set of colorsâ€”for example, 16 colors. However, the Colour Palette is no longer used in this way now that phones can display 16 million colours.
The CBR package name for the Colour Palette component is graphics_palette.

link.linktext: Graphics Components and Their CBR Package Names
